features: 22 colorful pieces: This building toy set includes 18 toy car parts, a battery-powered drill, and 3 bits
Tiny hands friendly: chunky pieces are easy to grab and put in place with a kid-friendly drill
Righty tighty, Lefty loosey: drill rotates in both directions
Motor skills: construction toys help with concentration, color and shape sorting, as well as motor skills
Go cruising: put all the pieces together and take it for a spin around the room!
Safe and sturdy: made of strong and durable materials. Battat toys meet or exceed the highest safety standards
Cleaning’s easy: Keep your vintage car shiny. Wipe it clean, and it's ready to go!
Batteries: toy car requires 2 x AA batteries. Batteries not included
Age limit: recommended for little drivers aged 3 years old and up
body.description: Heavy-duty fun for Itty Bitty hands! With battat’s take-apart roadster, your 4 year old engineer will build and discover, over and over and over… the roadster 18 colorful and chunky pieces are easy to assemble with the functioning battery-powered drill (and it turns in both directions, just like the grown-up version)! the 3 bits adapt to the different connectors because using the right tools is always best! Kids get to discover shapes and colors without even knowing they're learning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Battat Take-Apart Roadster Kids learn how to take things apart and put them back together with the Battat Take-A-Part Roadster. Children can get right to work with these tools and parts that are designed for young hands. The nifty powered screwdriver works just like the grown-up version, turning in two different directions to loosen and tighten connectors. It includes three different bits to fit the roadster's various connectors, helping teach children pattern matching and mechanical skills. Once the roadster is complete, they can take it for a spin around the room-and then it's time to check the engine! Just flip the switch to change the screwdriver's direction to easily unscrew piece after piece until there's nothing left but a pile of 18 parts. This toy is perfect for ages three and up. And don't forget, 'righty tighty, lefty loosey!'

Let's Get Rolling Build Fine Motor Skills Develop your child's fine motor skills with Battat Take-a-Part vehicles. With the tools provided, your child can take apart and rebuild these vehicles again and again. Easy to Use Screwdriver The power screwdriver comes with three bits and is simple to control. To change the direction of the screwdriver, just flip the switch on the bottom. The screwdriver requires two AA-size batteries, not included. Large Durable Pieces Take-a-Part screws and pieces are made large so small hands can easily work with them. They are engineered from a strong, durable plastic that's made tough for a long life. Each set includes all the pieces needed to build and take apart the toy, including vehicle parts, a screwdriver, and three bits.

Take-Apart 4x4 Truck Take-Apart Airplane Take-Apart Crane Truck Take-Apart Roadster Color Lime Green Red and Blue Blue and Yellow Red Age Grade 3 years + 3 years + 3 years + 3 years + Dimensions 11.5 (L) 6.5 (W) 4.5 (T) inches approximately 9.5 (L) 9.5 (W) 6.0 (T) inches approximately 10.5 (L) 5.5 (W) 6.5 (T) inches approximately 10.0 (L) 5.0 (W) 4.0 (T) inches approximately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for 3 year old!!
reviews.reviewText: My son LOVES this toy! He is obsessed with cars and trucks, as well as how things work. He plays with it daily and I love that it helps with his motor skills as well. So fun!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the IG educational bloggers recommended this toy. My kid enjoys screwing and unscrewing the truck together. The mechanics behind the drill works exactly like a real adult drill but without dangerous speed. Great transferable skill to invest in with this toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tool Time Fun
reviews.reviewText: If you know Battat toys, you know they are high quality and very sturdy. This car doesn't disappoint. I was looking for something my 3.5 year old grandson could take apart and put back together over and over without frustration. I love that the drill actually moves righty tighty and left loosy! The car is very cool looking and rolls around fast. It has 22 thick and durable pieces. It is safe while being very fun and appropriately challenging. A great find! Thank you to the gentlemen who was reviewing another similar toy and mentioned Battat was better and he is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect toy for 3-4 year olds. My grandson loves his. He loves working the drill and putting the car back together and taking it apart. Well made toy. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy toy... but needs a better drill!
reviews.reviewText: The Battat Take-Apart Crane Toy Truck Playset seems like a GREAT idea at first. The colors are fun and bright and the toy itself is very sturdy. My son (2.5 years old) loves to feel like he's actually building something with his tools (whereas usually we just pretend to "fix" things around the house with other tool toys) and the number of pieces (34) are just enough to give him a challenge to building, but not so many (or small) to be overly complicated or time consuming to assemble.My only COMPLAINT is the drill itself does not have enough torque to actually tighten/loosen the bolts and screws to assemble or disassemble effectively. I found myself "hand" tightening or loosening everything in both instances which kinda ruins the fun of the toy.Overall... the toy is fun and the fact that I'm constantly tightening/loosening for him doesn't seem to bother him. But for me, the tool leaves me wanting a bit more, unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hand/eye coordination
reviews.reviewText: Grandson loves this and spends a lot of time playing with it alone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toy & Great Company
reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my granddaughter. She loves it and opened it first, she's almost 3 years old. After her family went home her mother told me they must have lost a part that holds a wheel on since it was there when she played with it at my place. I emailed the company to see if they had the part and if I could possibly buy it. I received a replay that said they received my email. Within a week, the part arrived in the mail - no charge. How often does that happen?? I recommend their toys and think it is important for both boys and girls to learn how to put things together, this one comes with a battery operated drill and is fun for them to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds Childs interest
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for 3 year old grandson and he absolutely loved taking it apart and putting it back together over and over again. It’s a good size and the pieces are easy to handle. It doesn’t come with batteries so make sure to have some on hand. After several days he continues to play with it a lot. I plan to purchase more of this brand for Christmas. Would make a great gift for 2 1/2-4 year old.

reviews.reviewerName: Works and fit as good as the original.
reviews.reviewText: Mi hijo aprendió a montarlo y juega con él todos los días. Incluso a yo me gusta jugar con él😂
I recieved a used item but Amazon sorted it out.I would give the seller one star, but the toy is fantastic and I would highly recommend it.The quality is very good.
Awesome toy for a 3 year old boy. Highly recommend!
